SA11sanss08u:371_1: hy akṛtām anabhisaṃskārāṃ māyādharmatām asaṃkleśadharmatāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ
SA11sanss08u:371_2: sarvadharmāṇām avataraty ādiśuddhān sarvadharmān abhiśraddadhāty adhimucyate /
SA11sanss08u:374: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīr yo bodhisatvâpattim anāpattiṃ paśyati /
SA11sanss08u:386: athavā caityaṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvann aṣṭasahasraṃ japec caityapratimāyāḥ saddharmapustakānāṃ câikatamaṃ puraskṛtyâyam eva vidhir iti //
SA11sanss08u:387: cundādhāraṇīṃ vā tāvaj japed yāvat pāpakṣayanimittāni paśyati svapne /
SA11sanss08u:388: tad yathā krandanâdichardanadadhikṣīrâdibhojanāt tu vigatapāpo bhavati /
SA11sanss08u:391: tad yathā puruṣo mīḍhâvaliptaḥ sudhautusnānaṃ kṛtvā gandhair vilipyate /
SA11sanss08u:392: tasya tad daurgandhyaṃ vāntaṃ vigataṃ syād evaṃ pañcânantaryakāriṇas tat pāpaṃ vigacchati /
SA11sanss08u:393: yo 'pi daśâkuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatas tathāgate śraddhāṃ pratilabhya tathāgatabimbaṃ kārayet tasyâpi tat pāpaṃ na prajñāyate viśeṣato bodhicittasamanvāgatasya /
SA11sanss08u:396: yaś ca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitatathāgataṃ saṃmukhaṃ varṣaṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhôpadhānair upatiṣṭhed /
SA11sanss08u:397_0: yaś ca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya caitye bodhicittasaṃgṛhītâikapuṣpam āropayet tathāgatapūjāyai
SA11sanss08u:397_1: janâñjaliṃ côpanāmayej jalena vā siñcayed iṣikāpadaṃ vā dadyān nirmālyaṃ câpanayed
SA11sanss08u:397_2: upalepanapradānaṃ vā puṣpapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryād āttamanāḥ ekakramavyatihāraṃ
SA11sanss08u:398: namas tasmai buddhāya bhagavatêtimātre 'tra siṃhavikrīḍitakāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā yad asau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchen nêdaṃ-
SA11sanss08u:405: ye ca bodhisatvasaṃvaraṃ caturthaṃ śataṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ dhārayanti /
SA11sanss08u:406: ye punar abhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāsā bhikṣavaḥ pañcāśâdhike dve śikṣāpadaśate dhārayanti /
SA11sanss08u:408: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadād bhraṣṭā bhavanti /
SA11sanss08u:409: sacet te durgatibhayabhītās tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyur yathāvibhavataś ca pūjāṃ kuryuḥ /
SA11sanss08u:411: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
SA11sanss08u:414: yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /
SA11sanss08u:415: atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vâtra gambhīre buddhagocare //
SA11sanss08u:417: na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrânteṣu /
SA11sanss08u:420: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahânubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /
SA11sanss08u:422: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet //
SA11sanss08u:423: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhêndriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati /
SA11sanss08u:425: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasyâittakā guṇânuśaṃsā bhavati /
SA11sanss08u:429: teṣāṃ dīrgharātram anarthāyâhitāyâsukhāya vinipātāya bhaviṣyati // bha-
SA11sanss08u:433: asthānam ānandânavakāśo yeṣāṃ tasya nāmadheyaṃ nipatet karṇe teṣāṃ durgatyapāyagamanaṃ bhaved iti /
SA11sanss08u:435: yac ca tvam ānanda śraddadhāsi pattīyasi /
SA11sanss08u:438: abhūmiś câtra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvâikajātipratibaddhān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān iti //
SA11sanss08u:440: ye cânye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vâṣṭâṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasanti /
SA11sanss08u:441: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traivārṣikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayanti /
SA11sanss08u:443: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātaûpapadyema yatrâmitābhas tathāgataḥ /
SA11sanss08u:444: yaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabhavarājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ /
SA11sanss08u:445: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye 'ṣṭau bodhisatvā ṛddhyâgatya mārgam upadarśayanti /
SA11sanss08u:448: teṣāṃ tatrôpapannānāṃ tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate /
SA11sanss08u:450: te tataś cyutêha manuṣyaloke rājāno bhavanti /
SA11sanss08u:452: anekāni satvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśa kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
SA11sanss08u:459: yena ca punar mātṛgrāmeṇa tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss08u:473: prāṇâtipātāt prativirato bhavati bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvānām abhayaṃdadaḥ /
SA11sanss08u:475: yat pūrvântakoṭipañcagaticakrâruḍhena saṃsāranady-udyātena prāṇâtipātahetunā kāyavāṅmanasā karmâvaraṇaṃ kleśâvaraṇaṃ dharmâvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vā syāt kāritaṃ vânumoditaṃ syāt /
SA11sanss08u:476: tat sarvaṃ tena prāṇâtipātavairamaṇacakreṇa sarvânarthaṃ mardayati /
SA11sanss08u:478: sanikāyasabhāge devamanuṣyāṇāṃ priyo bhavati nirātaṅko dīrghâyuṣkêti //
SA11sanss08u:479: yāvat punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo bodhisatvo yāvajjīvam adattâdānāt prativirato bhavati sa sarvasatvānām abhayam dadāti anyatrâsayatnenâsaṃkṣobheṇa svalābhena saṃtuṣṭo viharati /
SA11sanss08u:482: rmikabhogânabhilāṣī sa tena kuśalamūlena yāvad adattâdānahetukaṃ karmâvaraṇaṃ mardayati pramardayati yāvad aśeṣam avipākaṃ kurutae iti //
SA11sanss08u:483: pe //evaṃ daśâpi kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svavipakṣâkuśalaghātakās tatra paṭhyante //
SA11sanss08u:488: kṣapayiṣye pāpakaṃ karma yan mayā purime kṛtam /
SA11sanss08u:493: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatiṃ /
SA11sanss08u:494: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃl labhanti te //
SA11sanss08u:495: ity evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ câdhikṛtya pāpakṣayaḥ //
SA11sanss08u:502: tad yathā kulaputra hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātaṃ /
SA11sanss08u:504: na ca tatra tat palaṃ śakyate tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ /
SA11sanss08u:506: evam evâikaḥ sarvajñatācittôtpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśâvaraṇalohāni pa-
SA11sanss08u:509: na ca sarvajñatācittôtpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaḥ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
SA11sanss08u:510: tad yathā kulaputrâikaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vā layane vā praveśyate sa saha praveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitam api tamondhakāraṃ vidhamayati /
SA11sanss08u:512_0: evam evâikaḥ sarvajñatācittôtpādapradīpo yādṛśe satvâśaye gahane 'vidyātamondhakārânugate
SA11sanss08u:512_1: praveśyate sa saha praveśito 'nabhilāpyakalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitam api karmakleśâvaraṇatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
SA11sanss08u:514: tad yathā kulaputra cintāmaṇirājamukuṭānāṃ mahānāgarājñāṃ nâsti parôpakramabhayaṃ /
SA11sanss08u:515: evam eva bodhicittamahākaruṇācintāmaṇirājamukuṭâvabaddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nâsti durgatyapāyaparôpakramabhayam iti //
SA11sanss08u:517: ihôpāle mahāyānaṃ saṃprasthito bodhisatvaḥ sacet pūrvâhṇakālasamaye āpattim āpadyeta /
SA11sanss08u:518: madhyâhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenâvirahito vihared aparyantâiva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanss08u:519: sacen madhyâhnakālasamaye āpattim āpadyate sāyâhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenâvirahito bhaved aparyantâiva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanss08u:521: evaṃ hy upāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ /
SA11sanss08u:522: tatra bodhisatvena nâtikaukṛtyaparyutthānam utpādyaṃ nâtivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss08u:523: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyaḥ pudgalaḥ punaḥ punar āpattim āpadyeta /
